select.if: select cy_order.*, cod.fd_order_person, cod.fd_supplier_name from cy_order left join cy_order_detailed cod on cy_order.fd_id = cod.fd_parent_id where #{fd_order_person} in (select distinct cy_order_detailed.fd_order_person from MTsupplier.dbo.cy_order_detailed where cy_order_detailed.fd_parent_id = cy_order.fd_id) and cod.fd_quotation_tatus = #{fd_quotation_tatus} order by fd_no desc

mapper.update: update cy_order_detailed set fd_offer=#{fd_offer}, fd_offer_time=#{fd_offer_time}, fd_qualified=#{fd_qualified}, fd_attachment=#{fd_attachment}, fd_return=#{fd_return}, fd_return_reason=#{fd_return_reason}, fd_remarks=#{fd_remarks}, fd_quotation_tatus=#{fd_quotation_tatus}, fd_add1=#{fd_add1} where fd_id = #{fd_id}
mapper.select: select cy_order_detailed.*, ComputationUnit.cComUnitName from MTsupplier.dbo.cy_order_detailed left join [UFDATA_001_2015].[dbo].ComputationUnit on cy_order_detailed.fd_unit = ComputationUnit.cComunitCode where fd_bid_closetime < (select cast(GETDATE() as date) as 'now') and fd_order_person = #{fd_order_person} and fd_offer is not null and fd_quotation_tatus = 1
